articles.author: Natalie Whiting
articles.title: Papua New Guinea vaccine program opened to all adults, border protection ramped up to keep Delta strain out - ABC News
articles.description: Australia's closest neighbour is facing vaccination issues, with people hesitant to have the jab as authorities consider banning all international flights to keep the Delta variant out of the country.
articles.content:
Papua New Guinea has opened its vaccine program to anyone over 18 years old as it tries to overcome high levels of hesitancy.
Key points:

articles.title: Say Hello To The $2.2 Billion ‘SKA’ As Humanity’s Biggest-Ever Telescope Gets The Green Light - Forbes
articles.description: The radio observatories in Australia and South Africa will be the two largest and most complex networks of radio telescopes ever built.
articles.content:
